New Records: Argentina won a record 16th Copa América title
Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored the winning goal in extra time
Lionel Messi left the game due to injury
Pre-Game Insights: The match started over 75 minutes late due to crowd control issues
Colombia had a 28-game unbeaten streak before the match
Post-Match Reflections: Angel Di Maria announced his retirement from international football after the match
Lautaro Martínez was the tournament's leading goal scorer
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami, Florida
Shakira performed during the halftime break
